homologous: MaChromosomes akafanana muchitarisiko uye anotakura majini ehunhu hwakafanana
meiosis: Sero division process inoburitsa gametes (sperm nezai) ine hafu yenhamba yemakromosomes sesero remubereki.
mitosis: Sero division process inogadzira maseru matsva ane nhamba yakafanana yemachromosome sesero remubereki
karyotyping: Kuongorora machromosome emunhu kuti aone zvisirizvo
phenotype: Hunhu hunocherechedzwa hwechipenyu, hwakatemerwa neese genotype uye nharaunda
dominant: Allele iyo inovhara mhedzisiro yerecessive allele kana iripo pane imwechete chromosome
recessive: Allele iyo yakafukidzwa neine allele yakakura kana iripo pane imwechete chromosome
punnett square: Dhiagiramu inoshandiswa kufanotaura mukana wekuti vana vagare nhaka hunhu chaihwo
biotechnology: Kushandiswa kwezvipenyu kana zvigadzirwa zvavo kugadzirisa kana kugadzira zvigadzirwa zvitsva kana maitiro
gmo: Acronym yakapihwa kune zvipenyu zvine genetic maitiro akachinjwa nenzira isingazviitike.
mushonga unorwisa mabhakitiriya: Chinhu chinouraya kana kutadzisa kukura kwebhakitiriya
utachiona: Infectious agent iyo inodzokorora mukati memasero echipenyu chinotakura
vaccine: Biological gadziriro inopa kudzivirirwa kune chimwe chirwere
nervous system: Network yemaseru akasarudzika anofambisa ruzivo mumuviri wese
endocrine system: Sisitimu yemagland inoburitsa mahormone anodzora mashandiro akasiyana emuviri
circulatory system: Sisitimu yenhengo nemidziyo inotakura ropa mumuviri wese
immune system: Sistimu yemasero uye nhengo dzinodzivirira muviri kubva kuchirwere
evolutionary adaptation: Hunhu hunopa kupona kana kubereka mukana kune chipenyu chiri munharaunda yacho
speciation: Nzira iyo mhando itsva inomuka kubva kumarudzi aripo
